text:
God forgave my sin in
Jesus’ name,

I've been born again in
Jesus’ name;

And in Jesus’ name

| come to you,

To share His love as
He told me to.

He said: ‘Freely, freely,
you have received,

Freely, freely give;

Go in My name, and
because you believe,
Others will know that I live.’

All power is given in Jesus’ name,
In earth and heaven in
Jesus’ name;


And in Jesus’ name | come to you
To share His power as
He told me to.

Carol Owens
